summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Animal Control; defining exotic animals; prohibiting the display of certain exotic animals at facilities owned or operated by the City of Seattle or on property owned by the City of Seattle; and amending Chapter 9.25 of the Seattle Municipal Code in connection therewith.
vote: 4-5 (Yes: Conlin, Licata, Nicastro, Wills; No: Compton, Drago, McIver, Pageler, Steinbrueck)
note: Proposed ban on exotic circus animals.
